metadata.title: CVE-2019-10188 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. Teachers ina quiz group could modify group overrides for other groups in the samequiz.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
